entry.title: Game: Professor Layton and the Diabolical Box (DS, 2009)
entry.content:
I played throug Professor Layton and the Diabolical Box, doing about a puzzle a day since February. Today, when I did the last in-game puzzle, I binged and did all the extra challenge puzzles.

It was very good Layton game. It was exactly what you would expect structurally. The new mini-games were interesting. I thought the moving around the different areas was a nice touch that added variety and assisted in the story development.

There were a few annoying puzzles, as always, that are poorly defined or brainless search problems, but in general it was really fun. I found tracking down everyone to give them tea particularly annoying, especially because you couldn't check who you needed to still visit.

All together, it took 21 hours 41 minutes. I will play the next one.
